original: intros ring x y Ax Ay. destruct ring as [_ [group _ _] _ _ _]. apply opp_unicity with (S := S) (G := A) (Add := Add) (O := O). - apply group. - apply regular_l with (S := S) (G := A) (Add := Add) (O := O) (Opp := Opp). + apply group. + apply Ay. + apply mult_opp_r; auto. + rewrite <- mult_opp_r; [reflexivity|assumption|assumption].
